english.segment1: Carry me away. Back in time to when I met You. Take all this guilt and shame. That buried me, and bury me in You
english.segment2: Chorus: I want to be dead but still alive. I want to breathe hope instead of choking. I want to feel the fire deep inside. Burn through me and carry me away
english.segment3: How fake could I be? You see through me. You see right through me. Would You sing to me?. And take me back to when I met you
english.segment5: I hear You calling me. I feel so far from home. You can see through my past. You've never let me go
